title: Help with the even
body:
Garen is my champ and for the 2nd part of the event I want to chose garen again. However if will not let me chose garen and i don't choose  Darius but is has already given me the Darius side icon (remember i haven't chosen yet). please help me i don't want to have the Darius icon but it gave it to me. please help me rito. 

If you look at this link it is my account and my icons
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/338526640542056448/467195658214834176/unknown.png  
you can see that i have the darius icon but i havent selected a side yet, i dont want the darius icon, help plz

replies.body: Every player will only get the icon for the side that won the event, which is Darius. The "Garen Won" icon is not available.
